subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Rick Porcello allowed six runs in under four innings, and Detroit lost to the visiting Minnesota Twins, 11-4, on a night the Tigers had hoped to clinch the A.L. Central title.
snippet: Rick Porcello allowed six runs in under four innings, and Detroit lost to the visiting Minnesota Twins, 11-4, on a night the Tigers had hoped to clinch the A.L. Central title.
